Description.div:
Default: Case
Valid Values:
Case - To generate Case SCMs
Pallet - To generates Pallet SCMs

Attribute.Name: EnterpriseCode
Attribute.Description: Specifies the context of an enterprise for which the SCMs are being generated. This is used while calling the user exit com.yantra.ydm.japi.ue.YDMGetNextSCMUE/YDMGetNextContainerSCMUE.

Attribute.Name: NumScmsRequested
Attribute.Description: Specifies the Number of SCMs required to be returned. Default is 1.

Attribute.Name: ShipNode
Attribute.Description: The ShipNode where SCMs are being generated

Attribute.Name: ShipmentKey
Attribute.Description: Identifies the ShipNode. Pass either ShipmentKey or ShipNode
